1.label: Parking Problems
1.desc: Inside of a large metal bucket.

2.label: Fragile, Do Not Break.
2.desc: On a wooden crate, next to the truck.

3.label: Do Not Be Late!
3.desc: Carried by Dominic Kunkel, one of the soldiers at the bar.

4.label: It's Easy Money
4.desc: Carried by one of the officers on the top floor of the church tower

1.label: Priority Package!
1.desc: On a cabinet, next to the window

2.label: Won’t Be Attending
2.desc: On a desk on the top floor.

3.label: Training Scenarios
3.desc: On a table at top floor of the building.

4.label: Resource Request
4.desc: On a wooden table on the top floor of the bell tower.

5.label: Armoury Exposed
5.desc: On a bench on the top floor.

1.label: Kriegsmarine Playing Cards
1.desc: On one of the tables inside the bar.

2.label: Ornate Compass
2.desc: Inside the safe on the top floor.

3.label: Covert Ops Field Manual
3.desc: On a table in the basement of the building.

stone-eagle.2.desc: On a small ledge jutting out from the wall of the round tower.
stone-eagle.3.desc: On top of the tower ruin out in the water.

1.label: Rifle Workbench
1.desc: In a small room behind the church. Can only be accessed through the back gardens by scaling @link[special.1|a wall].

2.label: SMG Workbench
2.desc: Inside the resistance hideout, can be accessed from the street. Look for white paint on the wall where you can climb up.

2.label: Bar
2.desc: Fregattenkapitän Seidl's driver is waiting at the bar

5.label: Axis Armoury
5.desc: The Bailliverie armoury's entrance is not secure.

6.label: Beaumont-Saint-Denis
6.desc: The Abbey rafters are in disrepair.

2.label: Key to Cellar
2.desc: In a document tray on a table on the top floor.

1.desc: Start of the trail leading to the @link[workbench.1].
